Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.nanoservice.interfaces

Annotation Type FromBody

@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(PARAMETER)
public @interface FromBody

This annotation marks method parameter containing request body. Type of the parameters must be:

  • for text/plain or text/html content: String, Reader, InputStream, CharacterSource
  • for text/xml content: as for text/plain plus Document, XMLStreamReader
  • for application/json content: as for text/plain plus JsonStaxParser, JsonSerializer
  • for any other content: InputStream
Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements 
    Modifier and Type Required Element Description
    java.lang.String mimeType  

  • Element Details

    • mimeType

      java.lang.String mimeType
      Returns:
      MIME type of input content
